definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: Jack is totally in love with his girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 傑克愛他的女友愛得五體投地。

sentences.english: Friendship often ends in love; but love in friendship - never.
sentences.chinese: 友誼終於愛情，而友愛無疆。

sentences.english: A bit of class solidarity spirit not to have.
sentences.chinese: 一點階級友愛精神都沒有。

sentences.english: We have strong solidarity, such as steel.
sentences.chinese: 我們團結友愛堅強如鋼。

sentences.english: Emil's fraternity rather prided itself upon its dances.
sentences.chinese: 愛彌兒的友愛在舞會上充分地顯示了出來。

sentences.english: The Olympic Spirit is the spirit of mutual understanding friendship solidarity and fair play.
sentences.chinese: 理解友愛合生芫益生菌價格團結和公平。

sentences.english: Only Zhang Jingshu, just as brave and true a friend, is still groaning in hospital.
sentences.chinese: 只有一樣沉勇而友愛的張靜淑君還在醫院裏呻吟。

sentences.english: Tell that to Libyans with loved ones obliterated by corporate-friendly Hellfires.
sentences.chinese: 而利比亞人民則是被友愛的地獄火導彈炸成碎片。

sentences.english: Popularity and rejection factors also exist in college students' psychology.
sentences.chinese: 大學生友愛心理有人緣因素和排斥因素。

sentences.english: The old hostel culture of camaraderie and socializing among students is gone.
sentences.chinese: 互助友愛的宿舍文化已經一去不復返了。

sentences.english: Thus may they know how to love each other.
sentences.chinese: 從而他們將知道如何去互相友愛。

sentences.english: You can harmonious development of society on the passion and friendship.
sentences.chinese: 你們能夠和諧地發展，社會就充滿熱情與友愛。

sentences.english: Our mutual love and unification Made us as strong as steel.
sentences.chinese: 我們團結友愛堅強如鋼。

sentences.english: In life, our unity and brotherhood, help each other.
sentences.chinese: 生活上，我們團結友愛，互相幫助。

sentences.english: Brotherliness and friendship are two conceptions that are both different and connected.
sentences.chinese: 友愛和友誼是一對既相區別又相聯繫的概念。

sentences.english: Anything else ?" The grocer cocked his head on one side, looking at her pleasantly."
sentences.chinese: “還要此外嗎？”店東把頭傾向一邊，友愛的望着她。

definition: to develop/to make full use of
to show concern and care for
Bo'ai county in Jiaozuo 焦作[Jiao1 zuo4], Henan
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
one's bosom (the seat of emotions)/breast/broad-minded and open/to think about/to cherish
without borders (used for organizations such as Médecins sans Frontières)
to take care/to keep an eye on/to look after/to tell/to remind
